mapper.select: select b.id, title, userid, content, b.post_date, view_count, (select count(*) from reply r where r.id_board=b.id) count from board b, member m where b.id_member = m.id order by b.id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into board (id_member, title, content) values (#{id_member}, #{title}, #{content})
insert into attach (fullname, id_board) values (#{fullName}, (SELECT max(id) FROM board))
mapper.update: update board set view_count=view_count+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select b.id,title,post_date,content,view_count,name,userid from board b join member m on b.id_member=m.id where b.id=#{id}
select fullname from attach where id_board=#{id} order by post_date desc
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
